contact.title: Get In Touch
contact.description: Let's connect and build something amazing together.

levelang.title: levelang.app
levelang.description: Skill-level-aware translation assistant for language learners
levelang.longDescription: A translation application for iOS and Android that adapts translation complexity to match your language proficiency level and desired mood. Like Google Translate, but tailored for learners - providing beginner-friendly, intermediate, or advanced translations. Features voice input/output, transliterations, and comprehensive language support for French, Italian, German, Mandarin Chinese, and Cantonese.

quiz.title: Language Quiz Service
quiz.description: AI-powered French grammar quiz backend with async problem generation
quiz.longDescription:
A backend service for generating AI-powered French grammar quiz problems. Each problem presents one correct sentence alongside incorrect alternatives with targeted grammatical errors—not random mistakes—helping learners practice language features such as conjugation patterns, auxiliary selection, past participle agreement, pronoun placement, and more.

Built on an async generation pattern with Kafka workers, problems are pre-generated and served from a pool using staleness-weighted random selection—ensuring variety while preventing repetition. A compositional prompt system supports multiple LLM providers (OpenAI, Gemini).
